metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9961 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
game-music-emu before 0.6.1 mishandles unspecified integer values.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgme0 - 0.6.0-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: game-music-emu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
